sentences: Palun võta kaasa kõik vajalikud dokumendid reisimiseks.
Maja ostmisel on olulised haldusdokumendid ja tehnilised dokumendid.
context: 'Dokumendid' is the plural form of the Estonian word 'dokument'. It refers to official papers or written documents used as evidence, to confirm rights, etc. This can include various types like plans, reports, orders, invoices, receipts, technical, economic, legal documents, as well as identity documents like passports, driver's licenses, ID cards, diplomas and other educational certificates. In a broader sense, it can also refer to any information source with a specific format and meaning.
